0.title: How to Build a Vue.js Application
0.text: In this article, we will explore the steps to build a robust Vue.js application from scratch. We will cover all the essential aspects like state management, routing, and best practices.

1.title: Understanding Vue 3 Composition API
1.text: The Composition API is a major feature introduced in Vue 3. It provides a new way of writing Vue components, making them more flexible and reusable. Let's dive into how it works.

2.title: Best Practices for Managing State in Vue
2.text: State management in Vue can be tricky. In this article, we will discuss the best practices for managing state effectively, including using Vuex and other techniques.

3.title: Exploring Vue Router: A Comprehensive Guide
3.text: Vue Router is essential for building single-page applications in Vue.js. In this guide, we will explore how to set up and configure routing, including dynamic routes and nested views.

4.title: Mastering Vue.js Directives: An In-Depth Overview
4.text: Vue.js directives are a powerful way to manipulate the DOM. In this article, we will go over built-in directives and how you can create custom ones to improve your Vue applications.

5.title: Vue 3 vs Vue 2: Key Differences and Improvements
5.text: Vue 3 introduces many breaking changes and new features. This article compares Vue 3 with Vue 2, highlighting the key differences and improvements to help you make an informed decision.
